name: authentification-site
description: This is an updated version of my login application(check my profile for more details). This time is done as a web application, and compared to the previous versions, it is fully working, meaning the accounts you create are stored in a database and you can login from anywhere at any time(as long as you have internet connection). You can check it for yourself here: http://82.76.142.241:5500/
